attributes.action: stipulate that an independent body of professional referees be responsible for officiating Premier League games in England... and that the independent body of professional referees be under the jurisdiction of a body outside of the English Football Association.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The beautiful game in this country is being ruined and competition undermined by incompetent and often contentious sub-standard refereeing. It's time for some trained and seasoned professionals to step in and pick up the pieces in an attempt to level the playing field and ensure fairness on the pitch.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
